text:
e="preserve">Cleve Loney (November 5, 1950 – August 22, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Montana House of Representatives from 2011 to 2013. He was born in Great Falls, Montana.
Loney died on August 22, 2020, in Great Falls at age 69. He drowned in the Missouri River after his kayak tipped over.
